Update:   Excellent case study for the notion that more touches of a level from the same direction = weaker level.   Often the highest probability trades = FIRST test of a level i.e. when it’s fresh.   Anything subsequent = weaker as buyers/sellers are absorbed.  Bravo, Bitcoin.
